Sentencas: In the present investigation, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) electrolyte coatings of 8 mol% Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 (YSZ) are applied on Ni-YSZ cermet fuel cell anode in ethanol by pulsed constant voltage-electrophoretic deposition (EPD).
Titulo: Pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: Press pressure and sintering temperature as two of the most effective parameters for NiO-YSZ composite fabrication are investigated.
Titulo: Pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: In order to create electrically conductive anodes, NiO-YSZ composite is reduced in H-2 atmosphere while its crystallinity being studied by X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: Pulsed constant voltage EPD process parameters such as pulse width, applied voltage and total deposition time are examined.
Titulo: Pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: The YSZ electrolyte film is sintered for 4 hat two different temperatures of 1300 and 1350 C. Optical microscope (OM) is used to study the surface quality of coating.
Titulo: Pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: Substrate morphology and the quality of YSZ electrolyte film are investigated by scanning electron microscope (SEM).
Titulo: Pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: Atomic force microscopy (AFM) is used to probe the surface roughness and the morphology of green and sintered coatings.
Titulo: Pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: Results show improved deposition yield by increasing applied voltage and total deposition time.
Titulo: Pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs applications

Sentencas: Uniform and dense coating was deposited at voltage of 35 V, pulse width of 1 ms, 50% duty cycle and total deposition time of 6 min having the thickness and roughness of about 17 +/- 1 mu m and 166 +/- 5 nm, respectively.
Titulo: Pulsed constant voltage electrophoretic deposition of YSZ electrolyte coating on conducting porous Ni-YSZ cermet for SOFCs applications
